# MPDAES26 - Technical Support Consultant Services Source List
**Government Tender Invitation**

[DESCRIPTION:** Construction de Défense Canada invites interested consulting firms to submit proposals to establish a Source List (SL) to provide professional services to the Department of National Defence (DND) as required.]

## Essential Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Defence Construction Canada /
Construction de Défense Canada
* **Address**: 350 Albert St,, 19th floor, Ottawa , Ontario K1A 0K3 Canada
* **Contact Person**: Jacob Lachapelle
Email: [jacob.lachapelle@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:jacob.lachapelle@dcc-cdc.gc.ca)
Phone: (343) 550-4560

## About the Source List

Construction de Défense Canada is seeking consulting firms to establish a Source List (SL) for the furnishing of "as and when required" professional services for the Department of National Defence (DND). The SL will be for a two-year period with an estimated maximum value of $2,000,000.

The selected list of consultants will be composed of the following specializations:

* Source List Manager
* Project Manager
* Senior Mechanical Engineer
* Intermediate Mechanical Engineer
* Senior Electrical Engineer
* Intermediate Electrical Engineer
* Senior Structural Engineer
* Intermediate Structural Engineer
* Senior Civil Engineer
* Intermediate Civil Engineer
* Senior Technical Writer (all disciplined)
* Intermediate CAD personnel
* Total Classification Rate
* Maximum Upset Unit Travel Rate to various Canadian locations

## Evaluation Criteria

Contracting Entity will evaluate the proposals according to the established criteria in the *RFP (Request for Proposal) documents.

## Requirements

* Bidders must submit their shortened proposals through the MERX Electronic Bidding System on or before the closing date.
*Refer to the *RFP Documents and to the information provided at the following link:

*http://www.merx.com/public/pricing for more details about the access and application of fees (where applicable).

## Contract Information

* The expected start date of the contract is unknown.
* The expected end date is also unknown.

# Based on the amended information, the submission deadline for this call of tender is September 15, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST.

You are an expert technical writer. Please ask me any clarification if you need any further information from the contractor.
